title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1436/96 of 23 July 1996 providing for the release of minimum stocks in the sugar sector for the period 1 July to 30 November 1996 and the replenishment thereof from 1 December 1996
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1436/96 of 23 July 1996 providing for the release of minimum stocks in the sugar sector for the period 1 July to 30 November 1996 and the replenishment thereof from 1 December 1996
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The percentages referred to in Article 1 of Regulation (EC) No 2790/95 are hereby reduced to 0 % for the period 1 July to 30 November 1996.
2. The percentages referred to in points (a) and (b) of Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 1789/81 are hereby reduced to 3 % from 1 December 1996.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 July 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 July 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
